article: A certain student passed all his examinations. Then he went to college to _ his studies. There he wrote down his _ for a course in English, but after the first _ , he didn t go to it any more. The English lecturer _ this student was always absent and thought he had _ to another course, so he was _ when he saw the boy s name on the list of students who wanted to take the English _ at the end of this year. The lecturer had _ a difficult paper, which followed his _ closely, and he was eager to see _ this student would answer the questions. He _ the boy s answers would be very bad, but when they _ him and he examined them _ , he was able to find only one small mistake in them. As this surprised him greatly, he _ the paper repeatedly but still couldn t find more than one mistake, so he _ for the student to question him about it. When he came and sat down, the lecturer asked him, I _ you came to my first lecture and you ve been absent from all the others. But I ve examined your _ carefully and I ve found only one small mistake in it. I m curious to know your _ . I m very _ about that mistake, answered the student. After the examination, I _ what I should have done. I would not have made that mistake if I had not been confused by your first lecture.
